trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Niagara Falls
There was one other sighting in Niagara Falls on or around March 13th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsWas trying to take pic of military jet in the sky and using my binoculurs saw maybe like other planes or far away birds wasn't sure so i pointed my camera in that direction which was above goat island,I was at a hotel in canada--the fallsview casino hotel on the 10th fl.And using full zoom that my camera had i pointed it toward the sky in the direction above goat island and took the pic and when i got home and uploaded the pic to my computer this is what i saw....Looks like 4 objects all having the same disc shape with a white oval center...I did try to highlight two of the disc to bring out more of their detail
Summary: Shot pic in the sky above Goat Island.
